field.name: campus
field.label: COM_THM_ORGANIZER_RM_CAMPUS_LABEL
field.query: SELECT name AS value, name AS campus FROM #__thm_organizer_campuses

field.name: building
field.label: COM_THM_ORGANIZER_RM_BUILDING_LABEL
field.query: SELECT name AS value, name AS building FROM #__thm_organizer_buildings

field.name: descriptionID
field.label: COM_THM_ORGANIZER_RM_DESCRIPTION_LABEL
field.query: SELECT id AS value, (CASE WHEN description NOT LIKE '' THEN CONCAT(category, ' / ', description) ELSE category END) AS descriptionID FROM #__thm_organizer_descriptions ORDER BY descriptionID
